name: get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool number2words.
Tool description: Convert any digit's number into the equivalent words
API description: Fetch the word equivalent of a given number in a specified language using an API.

language.description: The language in which the number should be translated.

number.description: The number to be converted to words.

authorization.description: Optional authorization token for the API. Defaults to a pre-set value.

content_type.description: The media type of the request. Defaults to 'application/json'.

accept_charset.description: The character encoding standard. Defaults to 'utf-8'.

locale.description: The locale to use for language-specific formatting. Defaults to 'USA'.

units.description: The unit type for the number. Defaults to 'cent'.

currency.description: The currency type related to the number. Defaults to 'dollar'.

output.description: The format of the output. Defaults to 'text'.
